text:
Need Blake Morgan for Autobarn campaign. Budget around $20,275, looking for 2 x TV appearance, 3 x YouTube short, 2 x Lifestyle photography, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x 10-minute unboxing. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 2 months. mate

Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
